title: RPT-CORRECTED-(OFFICIAL)-BRIEF-Albany International Q4 EPS $0.18
text: 45 AM / in 11 minutes RPT-CORRECTED-(OFFICIAL)-BRIEF-Albany International Q4 EPS $0.18 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read (In Feb. 5 BRIEF, corrects EPS to $0.18 from $0.12 and adjusted EPS to $0.44 from $0.43 after the company amended its numbers) Albany International Corp: * ALBANY INTERNATIONAL REPORTS FOURTH-QUARTER RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.18 * Q4 SALES ROSE 6.4 PERCENT TO $226.7 MILLION * Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.44 EXCLUDING ITEMS * OLIVIER JARRAULT HAS BEEN NAMED PRESIDENT AND CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER TO SUCCEED JOSEPH G. MORONE * DISCRETE TAX ITEMS & EFFECT OF CHANGE IN ESTIMATED INCOME TAX RATE INCREASED INCOME TAX EXPENSE BY $6.8 MILLION IN Q4 2017 * ESTIMATE 2018 TAX RATE ON INCOME FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS TO BE IN RANGE OF 27% TO 31% * AS FOR OUTLOOK FOR 2018, EXPECT 20% TO 30% GROWTH IN FULL-YEAR SALES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
